glossentry.glossterm: exploration for and evaluation of mineral resources

glossdef.p: The search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non‑regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource.
